statements: SELECT city_id, collection_schedule, recycling_statistics FROM WasteManagementActivities;
SELECT collection_schedule, city_id, recycling_statistics FROM WasteManagementActivities;
SELECT recycling_statistics, city_id, collection_schedule FROM WasteManagementActivities;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementActivities WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_id, collection_schedule FROM WasteManagementActivities WHERE recycling_statistics->>'recycling_rate' > '50%';
SELECT city_id, collection_schedule, recycling_statistics FROM WasteManagementActivities ORDER BY city_id ASC, collection_schedule DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementActivities WHERE city_id > 100 AND collection_schedule LIKE '%Monday%'
SELECT city_id, JSON_VALUE(recycling_statistics, '$.total_waste') AS total_waste FROM WasteManagementActivities WHERE JSON_VALUE(recycling_statistics, '$.total_waste') > 500

SELECT city_id, AVG(JSON_VALUE(recycling_statistics, '$.recycled_percentage')) AS avg_recycled_percentage FROM WasteManagementActivities GROUP BY city_id HAVING avg_recycled_percentage > 70 ORDER BY avg_recycled_percentage DESC
SELECT city_id, collection_schedule, recycling_statistics FROM WasteManagementActivities WHERE JSON_VALUE(recycling_statistics, '$.collection_frequency') = 'weekly'
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedules;
SELECT city_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT city_id, collection_date, collection_frequency FROM WasteCollectionSchedules ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT city_id, collection_date, waste_type FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE city_id=1;
SELECT city_id, collection_date, collection_frequency FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE collection_frequency='Weekly';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE city_id = 1 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT city_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY city_id ASC, collection_date ASC;
SELECT city_id, collection_frequency FROM WasteCollectionSchedules WHERE collection_frequency IN ('Weekly', 'Bi-weekly') ORDER BY city_id;
SELECT city_id, recycling_date, waste_category, recycling_amount FROM RecyclingStatistics WHERE recycling_amount > 1000 ORDER BY recycling_date DESC;
SELECT city_id, waste_category FROM RecyclingStatistics WHERE recycling_percentage > 50 ORDER BY city_id ASC, recycling_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_schedules
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_time FROM collection_schedules ORDER BY collection_date DESC
SELECT * FROM recycling_statistics WHERE recycle_material = 'Plastic' AND recycled_weight > 100
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM waste_management_companies WHERE company_location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT recycle_material, SUM(recycled_weight) AS total_weight FROM recycling_statistics GROUP BY recycle_material
SELECT * FROM collection_schedules ORDER BY collection_date DESC, schedule_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT collection_type, COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM collection_schedules GROUP BY collection_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT recycle_date, recycle_material, recycled_weight FROM recycling_statistics WHERE recycled_weight > 100 ORDER BY recycled_weight DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_management_companies WHERE company_location IN ('City A', 'City B') AND company_name LIKE '%Recycle%'
SELECT c.company_name, c.company_location, r.recycled_weight FROM waste_management_companies c JOIN recycling_statistics r ON c.company_id = r.recycle_id ORDER BY r.recycled_weight DESC
SELECT * FROM collection_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, city_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, collection_type FROM collection_schedule WHERE collection_frequency > 1;
SELECT city_name, total_amount_recycled, recycling_rate FROM recycling_statistics WHERE total_amount_recycled >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_areas WHERE area_name LIKE 'West%';
SELECT city_name, vehicle_number, vehicle_type FROM waste_collection_vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM collection_schedule WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT id, collection_type, schedule_date FROM collection_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM waste_collection_areas GROUP BY city_name HAVING total_collections > 3;
SELECT city_name, SUM(total_amount_recycled) AS total_recycled_amount FROM recycling_statistics GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY total_recycled_amount DESC;
SELECT vehicle_number, vehicle_type FROM waste_collection_vehicles WHERE capacity_in_tons > 3 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM collection_schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_day, collection_time FROM collection_schedules WHERE collection_area = 'Downtown';
SELECT * FROM recycling_statistics ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT recycling_type, collected_amount FROM recycling_statistics WHERE collected_amount > 100;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM waste_management_company WHERE company_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM collection_schedules WHERE collection_day = 'Monday';
SELECT recycling_type, collected_amount FROM recycling_statistics WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_name, route_duration FROM truck_routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM waste_management_company WHERE company_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT location_lat, location_long, capacity FROM waste_bins WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location_lat, location_long ASC;
